cbuff.h File Reference

This is the header file for the CBUFF driver which exposes the data structures and exported API which can be used by the applications to use the CBUFF driver. More...

#include <ti/common/mmwave_error.h>
#include <ti/common/sys_common.h>
#include <ti/drivers/soc/soc.h>
#include <ti/drivers/csi/csi.h>
#include <ti/drivers/edma/edma.h>
#include <ti/drivers/adcbuf/ADCBuf.h>

Macros

#define CBUFF_EINVAL   (MMWAVE_ERRNO_CBUFF_BASE-1)
 Error Code: Invalid argument.
 
#define CBUFF_ENOMEM   (MMWAVE_ERRNO_CBUFF_BASE-2)
 Error Code: Out of memory.
 
#define CBUFF_EINUSE   (MMWAVE_ERRNO_CBUFF_BASE-3)
 Error Code: Operation cannot be implemented because the CBUFF driver is in use.
 
#define CBUFF_ENOTSUP   (MMWAVE_ERRNO_CBUFF_BASE-4)
 Error Code: Operation cannot be implemented because the CBUFF driver is not supporting this currently.
 
#define CBUFF_EDMA_FAIL   (MMWAVE_ERRNO_CBUFF_BASE-5)
 Error Code: The application failed to provide the EDMA resources which are required by the CBUFF driver to support the application use case.
 
#define CBUFF_ELIMIT   (MMWAVE_ERRNO_CBUFF_BASE-6)
 Error Code: Limit exceeded.
 
#define CBUFF_MAX_USER_BUFFER   3U
 Maximum number of user supplied data buffers which can be configured and sent over the interface.
 
#define CBUFF_MAX_NUM_SESSION   7U
 Maximum number of sessions which can be supported by the CBUFF Driver. More...

Detailed Description

This is the header file for the CBUFF driver which exposes the data structures and exported API which can be used by the applications to use the CBUFF driver.
